author: Jennifer Borresen
title: What to expect if you are being tested for the coronavirus - USA TODAY
description: What to expect if you are being tested for the coronavirus USA TODAY If You Have Coronavirus Symptoms, Assume You Have the Illness, Even if You Test Negative The New York Times Trump's Spin on 'Broken' Testing FactCheck.org Coronavirus cases by state: A look …
content:
COVID-19 cases in the U.S. surged past China and Italy last week as more tests became available throughout the country.
President Donald Trump said Monday that more than 1 million Americans have been tested for the new coronavirus, and many more tests are ex… [+3290 chars]
